channel.title: Help please?!?

item.title: Help please?!?
item.dc:creator: @NotLikingThis NotLikingThis
item.description:
@NotLikingThis wrote:

case 12007:
itemDef.modelid = 12007;
itemDef.name = “Ancient Blade”;
itemDef.modelZoom = 676;
itemDef.modelRotationY = 498;
itemDef.modelRotationX = 484;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = 5;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = -1;
itemDef.anInt165 = 12007;
itemDef.anInt200 = 12008;
itemDef.groundActions = new String[5];
itemDef.groundActions[2] = “Take”;
itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
itemDef.itemActions[1] = “Wear”;
itemDef.itemActions[4] = “Drop”;
break;
I believe it would be like that.

item.description:
